Articles.Content:
This challange is to make a plane go as far as you can ( eastern around kerbin ) . The rules are:

1. 1 winglet for every ton

2. only mecjeb and b9aerospace

3. must not have any oxidizer but you can use solid rocket

4. must stay below 40km

5. must have atleast 1 kerban

6. you must have atleast 2 pictures or a video ( a picture of your craft flying and one of the flight results ( the maximum speed ,altitude and height )

you are allowed to use smart A.S.S in mecjeb

Here is the scoring system .

+ 100km if you can land on water 1 time

*2 if maximum speed is over 200mp/s

*2 if you can do multiple water landings

*2 if can be a votl( hovercraft )

*2 for not useing b9aerospace

+ ( your maximum speed )

+ maximum height ( 100m = 1km added )

+ 100km for every kerbin on your plane ( with a maximum of 10 kerbins )

+ 50km for a escape mechanism

- 10km for every part above 20

so here is my score :

1041( my distance )+100 ( water landing )+200 (2 kerbols) + 204 ( height)+ 349 (max speed)*2 ( faster than 200mp/s)-230km ( for 43 parts )=2013KM

My plane crashed into a mountain at 1000m high with 2/3 of my fuel left... so if you have eneough spare time it should be easy for you to beat my terrible record.

Pictures : http://www.flickr.com/photos/98008567@N08/9200385685/ http://www.flickr.com/photos/98008567@N08/9200385133/ http://www.flickr.com/photos/98008567@N08/9200384607/

Around the world. Without any mods. Not even Mechjeb. Wanna give this challenge a try? Go ahead. Prepare for the extreme rules.

As much as I want to spew some rant about allowing Mechjeb, I've chosen to keep it to myself.
